column4: I would like my ubuntu server, to have a virtual interface setup with a static ip, that when it receives any traffic it redirects/routes traffic to a random ip (ip1, ip2, or ip3)
do it! sudo ifconfig eth0:1 10.0.0.1 netmask 255.255.255.0 (for example)
then use iptables to set a redirect rule
but i want it randomly to select an ip
